data.name: AngleNotBelow90
data.value: Value must be smaller than 90 degrees

data.name: BadGraphics
data.value: This game is not supported by your graphics card.

data.name: CallMethodOnlyOnce
data.value: This method may be called only once on this object.

data.name: DirectXMissing
data.value: The required version of DirectX is not installed on your computer.

data.name: DumpFail
data.value: Failed to dump view data to file.

data.name: DynamicShaderCompileFail
data.value: The dynamic shader could not be compiled.

data.name: EngineCannotChange
data.value: Engine can not be changed again once it has been set.

data.name: EngineNotSetYet
data.value: Engine has not been set yet.

data.name: InvalidScreenshotSize
data.value: The screenshot resolution must not exceed the current render resolution.

data.name: LightsNotDeactivated
data.value: DeactivateLights was not called after the last render pass.

data.name: LoadingMusic
data.value: Loading music...

data.name: MeshIndexBufferNot16bit
data.value: The mesh doesn't use 16-bit indices.

data.name: MeshIndexBufferNot32bit
data.value: The mesh doesn't use 32-bit indices.

data.name: MinimumShaderModel
data.value: You need a graphics card that supports at least Shader Model {0}.

data.name: NoDebugInFullscreen
data.value: The engine debug interface cannot be activated while in fullscreen mode.

data.name: NoLinearTextureFiltering
data.value: Your graphics card does not support linear texture filtering.

data.name: NoModifyTerrainColorWithoutLighting
data.value: The terrain color can't be modified if terrain lighting is disabled.

data.name: NoModifyTerrainHeightWithLighting
data.value: The terrain height-map can't be modified if terrain lighting is enabled.

data.name: NoSuchBody
data.value: There was no such body found:

data.name: NoSuchLightSource
data.value: There was no such light source found:

data.name: NotAvailable
data.value: A required graphics feature was not available

data.name: NotFoundShaderFile
data.value: The following shader data file could not be found:

data.name: NotSupportedShader
data.value: This shader is not supported by your graphics card.

data.name: NumberNotReal
data.value: The value must be a real number.

data.name: ReleasedTooOften
data.value: The Release method was called to often on {0}.

data.name: SongAlreadyLoaded
data.value: This song was loaded more than once:

data.name: SongLoadFailed
data.value: Failed to load song:

data.name: UnknownVertexFormat
data.value: The specified vertex format is not known.

data.name: ValueNotPositive
data.value: The value must be greater than 0.

data.name: VBMustBeFVF
data.value: The vertex buffer must use a fixed-function vertex format.

data.name: WrongAssetType
data.value: The following file was previously loaded as a different asset type:

data.name: WrongHeightMapSize
data.value: Height-map size must equal terrain size.

data.name: WrongOcclusionIntervalMapSize
data.value: Occlusion interval map size must equal terrain size.

data.name: WrongTexArrayLength
data.value: The array must have a length of {0}.

data.name: WrongTextureMapSize
data.value: Texture-map size must be exactly a third of the terrain size.

data.name: WrongVertexCountLine
data.value: Number of vertexes must be a multiple of 2 for a LineList.

data.name: WrongVertexCountTriangle
data.value: Number of vertexes must be a multiple of 3 for a TriangleList.
